summary: This mod takes the wonderful works of our community and divides them by chapter, then implements them into the games dungeons, inns and farms.
descriptionHtml:
Hey Guys, it\'s 3PSQWERTY! Im glad you stumbled upon my mod (Hopefully not on StumbleUpon). Here is the description of the mod. This mod adds many new stories created by our wonderful community, turns them into books divided by chapter, and implements them into the dungeons and inns of the game. This mod is currently in BETA stage, finishing this will take quite some time and I have already invested at least 6 hours into this. Here\'s exactly what this mod does: 

Add 55 new books from a popular series: Honor Among Thieves: The Unwilling Nightingale (By Madame Hyde) http://www.fanfiction.net/s/8259764/1/Honor-Among-Thieves-The-Unwilling-Nightingale 

UPDATE: A Bite of my Love (By Core of a Doll) has been added: Download the update if you don\'t have it.

UPDATE: How the Dragonborn Stole Saturalia has been added in High Hrothgar (written by OtakuSoze) http://www.fanfiction.net/s/8804547/1/How-the-Dragonborn-Stole-Saturalia

This mod will add next update: 

75 more books(Finishing Honor Among Thieves and adding a new one) 

Custom Vendors 

If you would like your story to be added to this mod, comment or PM me. Also comment on any features you would like to see added into the mod. 

I have the permission of all authors to use their works in this mod.

Installation: Use the Download with Manager Button, or manually drag the ESP into your data folder

WARNING: THIS MOD IS NOT LORE FRIENDLY!

Before you manipulate this ESP be sure to ask my permission.

Here is the list of where the books are currently located: 

1. Bleak Falls Barrow 
2. Four Shields Inn
